# hardware_storage_tuning

**Role Path**: `roles/hardware/storage_tuning`

## Description
**Physical Storage Optimization**
Optimizes I/O schedulers, disk parameters, and filesystem-specific mount options.

## Key Tasks
- Enable SSD TRIM timer (FSTRIM)
- Set I/O scheduler for disks (Physical, Virtual, Flash, RAM)
- Gather storage device facts (Robust & Aligned)
- Normalize Storage Device Capacities & Alignment
- Apply Aligned Read-Ahead Tuning (>1TB)
